item.text: Jesus entered Jericho and was passing through it.

<st data-num="2400" class="">Now</st><n id="1" /> a <st data-num="435" class="">man</st> <st data-num="2564 3686">named</st> <st data-num="2195" class="">Zacchaeus</st> was there; <st data-num="846" class="">he</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> a <st data-num="754">chief tax collector</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> was <st data-num="4145" class="">rich</st>.

He<n id="1" /> was <st data-num="2212" class="">trying</st> to get a <st data-num="1492" class="">look</st> at <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>,<n id="2" /> but <st data-num="1510" class="">being</st> a <st data-num="2244 3398">short</st> man he <st data-num="1410" class="">could</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> see <st data-num="575" class="">over</st> the <st data-num="3793" class="">crowd</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> he <st data-num="4390">ran on ahead</st> and <st data-num="305">climbed up</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">into</st> a <st data-num="4809">sycamore tree</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">see</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> <st data-num="1565" class="">Jesus</st><n id="3" /> was <st data-num="3195">going to</st> <st data-num="1330" class="">pass</st> that way.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">when</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> <st data-num="1909">to</st> that <st data-num="5117" class="">place</st>, he <st data-num="308">looked up</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="3004">said</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="2195">Zacchaeus</st>, <st data-num="2597">come down</st> <st data-num="4692" class="">quickly</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1063" class="">because</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="1163" class="">must</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="3306" class="">stay</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">at</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3624" class="">house</st> <st data-num="4594" class="">today</st>.”<n id="4" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st> he <st data-num="2597" class="">came down</st> <st data-num="4692" class="">quickly</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5264" class="">welcomed</st> <st data-num="846" class="">Jesus</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="5463" class="">joyfully</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> when the people<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> it, they <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="1234" class="">complained</st>,<n id="2" /> “He has <st data-num="1525">gone in</st> to <st data-num="2647">be the guest of</st> a <st data-num="435" class="">man</st> who is a <st data-num="268" class="">sinner</st>.”<n id="3" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="2195" class="">Zacchaeus</st> <st data-num="2476" class="">stopped</st> and <st data-num="3004">said</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st>, “<st data-num="2400" class="">Look</st>, <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st>, <st data-num="2255" class="">half</st> of <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="5225">possessions</st> I now <st data-num="1325" class="">give</st><n id="1" /> to the <st data-num="4434" class="">poor</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st><n id="2" /> I have <st data-num="4811" class="">cheated</st> <st data-num="5100">anyone</st> of <st data-num="5100">anything</st>, I am <st data-num="591">paying back</st> <st data-num="5073">four times as much</st>!”

<st data-num="1161" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st> <st data-num="4314">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="4594">Today</st> <st data-num="4991" class="">salvation</st><n id="2" /> has <st data-num="1096" class="">come</st> to <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="3624" class="">household</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2530" class="">because</st> <st data-num="846" class="">he</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">too</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> a <st data-num="5207" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="11" class="">Abraham</st>!<n id="4" />
For the Son of Man came to seek and to save the lost.”
While the people were listening to these things, Jesus proceeded to tell a parable because he was near to Jerusalem, and because they thought that the kingdom of God was going to appear immediately.

<st data-num="3767" class="">Therefore</st> he <st data-num="3004">said</st>, “A <st data-num="2104" class="">nobleman</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4198" class="">went</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> a <st data-num="3117" class="">distant</st> <st data-num="5561" class="">country</st> to <st data-num="2983" class="">receive</st><n id="2" /> for <st data-num="1438" class="">himself</st> a <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st> <st data-num="2532">and then</st> <st data-num="5290" class="">return</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">And</st> he <st data-num="2564" class="">summoned</st> <st data-num="1176" class="">ten</st> of <st data-num="1438" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1401" class="">slaves</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1325" class="">gave</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="1176" class="">ten</st> <st data-num="3414" class="">minas</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, ‘Do <st data-num="4231" class="">business</st> with these <st data-num="1722 3739">until</st> I <st data-num="2064" class="">come back</st>.’

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="4177" class="">citizens</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3404" class="">hated</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="649" class="">sent</st> a <st data-num="4242" class="">delegation</st> <st data-num="3694" class="">after</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>, ‘We do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2309" class="">want</st> <st data-num="3778">this man</st><n id="3" /> to be <st data-num="936" class="">king</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="1909" class="">over</st> <st data-num="1909">us</st>!’

<st data-num="1722">When</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="846" class="">he</st> <st data-num="1880" class="">returned</st> after <st data-num="2983" class="">receiving</st> the <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st>, <st data-num="846" class="">he</st> <st data-num="5455" class="">summoned</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3778" class="">these</st> <st data-num="1401" class="">slaves</st> to <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> he had <st data-num="1325" class="">given</st> the <st data-num="694" class="">money</st>. He wanted<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1097" class="">know</st> <st data-num="5101">how much</st> they had <st data-num="1281">earned<n id="4" /> by trading</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="4413" class="">first one</st> <st data-num="3854">came before</st> him and <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, ‘<st data-num="2962">Sir</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3414" class="">mina</st><n id="3" /> has <st data-num="4333" class="">made</st> <st data-num="1176" class="">ten</st> <st data-num="3414" class="">minas</st> <st data-num="4333" class="">more.’</st>

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> the king<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, ‘<st data-num="2095">Well done</st>, <st data-num="18" class="">good</st> <st data-num="1401" class="">slave</st>! <st data-num="3754" class="">Because</st> you <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">been</st> <st data-num="4103" class="">faithful</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> a <st data-num="1646">very small</st> matter, you will <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="1849" class="">authority</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1883" class="">over</st> <st data-num="1176" class="">ten</st> <st data-num="4172" class="">cities.’</st>

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="1208">second one</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> and <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, ‘<st data-num="2962">Sir</st>, <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3414" class="">mina</st> has <st data-num="4160" class="">made</st> <st data-num="4002" class="">five</st> <st data-num="3414" class="">minas.’</st>

<st data-num="1161" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> the king<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="3778" class="">him</st>, ‘<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> are to <st data-num="1096" class="">be</st> <st data-num="1883" class="">over</st> <st data-num="4002" class="">five</st> <st data-num="4172" class="">cities.’</st>

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st> <st data-num="2087" class="">another</st><n id="1" /> slave<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> and <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, ‘<st data-num="2962" class="">Sir</st>, <st data-num="2400" class="">here</st> is<n id="3" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3414" class="">mina</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> I <st data-num="606">put away for safekeeping</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> a <st data-num="4676" class="">piece of cloth</st>.<n id="5" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> I was <st data-num="5399" class="">afraid</st> of <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> you <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> a <st data-num="840" class="">severe</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="444" class="">man</st>. You <st data-num="142" class="">withdraw</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3739" class="">what</st> you did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="5087" class="">deposit</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2325" class="">reap</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">what</st> you did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4687" class="">sow.’</st>

The king<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, ‘I will <st data-num="2919" class="">judge</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">by</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> own <st data-num="4750" class="">words</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="4190" class="">wicked</st> <st data-num="1401" class="">slave</st>!<n id="3" /> So you <st data-num="1492" class="">knew</st>, did you, <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> a <st data-num="840" class="">severe</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="444" class="">man</st>, <st data-num="142" class="">withdrawing</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">what</st> I <st data-num="3756" class="">didn’t</st> <st data-num="5087" class="">deposit</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2325" class="">reaping</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">what</st> I <st data-num="3756" class="">didn’t</st> <st data-num="4687" class="">sow</st>?

<st data-num="1223 5101">Why</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">then</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">didn’t</st> you <st data-num="1325" class="">put</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="694" class="">money</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="5132" class="">bank</st>,<n id="2" /> so that when <st data-num="2504" class="">I</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">returned</st> I could have <st data-num="4238" class="">collected</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st> <st data-num="4862" class="">with</st> <st data-num="5110" class="">interest?’</st>

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> he <st data-num="3004">said</st> to his <st data-num="3936" class="">attendants</st>,<n id="1" /> ‘<st data-num="142">Take</st> the <st data-num="3414" class="">mina</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1325" class="">give</st> it to the one who <st data-num="2192" class="">has</st> <st data-num="1176" class="">ten.’</st><n id="2" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">But</st><n id="1" /> they <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, ‘<st data-num="2962">Sir</st>, he <st data-num="2192" class="">has</st> <st data-num="1176" class="">ten</st> <st data-num="3414" class="">minas</st> already!’<n id="2" />

‘I <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">everyone</st> who <st data-num="2192" class="">has</st> will be <st data-num="1325" class="">given</st> more,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> the one who does <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">even</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">what</st> he <st data-num="2192" class="">has</st> will be <st data-num="142">taken away</st>.<n id="2" />
But as for these enemies of mine who did not want me to be their king, bring them here and slaughter them in front of me!’”
After Jesus had said this, he continued on ahead, going up to Jerusalem.

<st data-num="2532" class="">Now</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="5613" class="">when</st> he <st data-num="1448" class="">approached</st> <st data-num="967" class="">Bethphage</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="963" class="">Bethany</st>, <st data-num="4314" class="">at</st> the place <st data-num="2564" class="">called</st> the <st data-num="3735" class="">Mount</st> of <st data-num="1636" class="">Olives</st>,<n id="3" /> he <st data-num="649" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="1417" class="">two</st> of the <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st>,

<st data-num="3004" class="">telling</st> them,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="5217">Go</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="2968" class="">village</st> <st data-num="2713" class="">ahead</st> of you.<n id="2" /> When<n id="3" /> you <st data-num="1531" class="">enter</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">it</st>, you will <st data-num="2147" class="">find</st> a <st data-num="4454" class="">colt</st> <st data-num="1210" class="">tied</st> there <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> <st data-num="2523" class="">has</st> <st data-num="3762 4455">never</st> been <st data-num="2523" class="">ridden</st>.<n id="4" /> <st data-num="3089" class="">Untie</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st> and <st data-num="71" class="">bring</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st> here.

<st data-num="1437" class="">If</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">anyone</st> <st data-num="2065" class="">asks</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, ‘<st data-num="1223 5101">Why</st> are you <st data-num="3089" class="">untying</st> it?’ <st data-num="3779" class="">just</st> <st data-num="3004">say</st>, ‘The <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="5532" class="">needs</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="846" class="">it.’</st>”

<st data-num="1161" class="">So</st> those who were <st data-num="649">sent ahead</st> <st data-num="2147" class="">found</st><n id="1" /> it <st data-num="2531">exactly<n id="2" /> as</st> he had <st data-num="3004">told</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>.

As<n id="1" /> <st data-num="846" class="">they</st> were <st data-num="3089" class="">untying</st> the <st data-num="4454" class="">colt</st>, <st data-num="846" class="">its</st> <st data-num="2962" class="">owners</st> <st data-num="3004">asked</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>,<n id="2" /> “<st data-num="5101">Why</st> are you <st data-num="3089" class="">untying</st> that <st data-num="4454" class="">colt</st>?”
They <st data-num="3004" class="">replied</st>, “The <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="2192 5532">needs</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st>.”

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> they <st data-num="71" class="">brought</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>, <st data-num="1977" class="">threw</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="2440" class="">cloaks</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="4454" class="">colt</st>,<n id="3" /> and had <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="1913" class="">get on</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st>.

As<n id="1" /> <st data-num="846">he</st> <st data-num="4198">rode along</st>, they<n id="2" /> <st data-num="5291" class="">spread</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">their</st> <st data-num="2440" class="">cloaks</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="3598" class="">road</st>.

As <st data-num="846" class="">he</st> <st data-num="1448" class="">approached</st> the road <st data-num="2600">leading down</st> from<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="3735" class="">Mount</st> of <st data-num="1636" class="">Olives</st>,<n id="2" /> the <st data-num="537" class="">whole</st> <st data-num="4128" class="">crowd</st> of his<n id="3" /> <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st> <st data-num="757">began</st> to <st data-num="5463" class="">rejoice</st><n id="4" /> and <st data-num="134" class="">praise</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> with a <st data-num="3173" class="">loud</st> <st data-num="5456" class="">voice</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">for</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="1411">mighty works</st><n id="6" /> they had <st data-num="1492" class="">seen:</st><n id="7" />
“Blessed is the king who comes in the name of the Lord! Peace in heaven and glory in the highest!”

<st data-num="2532" class="">But</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="5100" class="">some</st> of the <st data-num="5330" class="">Pharisees</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="575" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="3793" class="">crowd</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="1320">Teacher</st>, <st data-num="2008" class="">rebuke</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st>.”<n id="3" />
He answered, “I tell you, if they keep silent, the very stones will cry out!”
Now when Jesus approached and saw the city, he wept over it,

<st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>, “<st data-num="1487">If</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> had only <st data-num="1097" class="">known</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">on</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">even</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, the things that make <st data-num="4314">for</st> <st data-num="1515" class="">peace</st>!<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="3568" class="">now</st> they are <st data-num="2928" class="">hidden</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3788" class="">eyes</st>.

<st data-num="3754" class="">For</st> the <st data-num="2250" class="">days</st> will <st data-num="2240" class="">come</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">upon</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> when <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="2190" class="">enemies</st> will <st data-num="4016" class="">build</st><n id="1" /> an <st data-num="5482" class="">embankment</st><n id="2" /> against <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4033" class="">surround</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4912">close in</st> on <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3840">from every side</st>.
They will demolish you—you and your children within your walls—and they will not leave within you one stone on top of another because you did not recognize the time of your visitation from God.”
Then Jesus entered the temple courts and began to drive out those who were selling things there,
saying to them, “It is written, ‘My house will be a house of prayer,’ but you have turned it into a den of robbers!”
Jesus was teaching daily in the temple courts. The chief priests and the experts in the law and the prominent leaders among the people were seeking to assassinate him,
but they could not find a way to do it, for all the people hung on his words.
